item.title: I trying vesta statius for donators dont work Help me!
item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341
item.description:
@twinky12341 wrote:

[quote=“TheImpureOne, post:7, topic:300684”][quote author=twinky12341 link=topic=396943.msg2949296#msg2949296 date=1252391459]
}
if(wearID == item id){
if (donator <= 0) {
sM(“You Need to be donator to wear this!!”);
GoFalse = true;
}

try this code.
[/quote]
He is mostly right, Just I’ma give you a little more info.

Find this:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

and under that put what you wish…ex:

if(wearID == 4151) { sM("You can't wear a whip!"); GoFalse = true; }[/quote]

ya thats more help for him ty for backing me up

item.title: I trying vesta statius for donators dont work Help me!

[quote=“twinky12341, post:4, topic:300684”] }
if(wearID == item id){
if (donator <= 0) {
sM(“You Need to be donator to wear this!!”);
GoFalse = true;
}

try this code.[/quote]
He is mostly right, Just I’ma give you a little more info.

Find this:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

and under that put what you wish…ex:

if(wearID == 4151) { sM("You can't wear a whip!"); GoFalse = true; }
